casebody.data:
EXPRESSIONS HAIR DESIGN, et al., Respondents,
v.
Eric T. SCHNEIDERMAN, etc., et al., Appellants. Court of Appeals of New York. January 11, 2018

Chief Judge DiFiore and Judges Rivera, Stein, Fahey, Garcia, Wilson and Feinman concur.

***1052Certification of a question by the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit, pursuant to section 500.27 of this Court's Rules of Practice, accepted and the issues presented are to be considered after briefing and argument.
